subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP Maker Problem
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Rees,

> its the other way around it works on the laptop but not the home cpu.

OK, sorry for the confusion...;)

> Yes I played it on Winamp?

Another idea: Please check the soundcard settings in EVPmaker under
Extras > Settings. Make sure that the correct sound device is selected.

If this doesn't help:

What's your Windows version?
What type/model of soundcard do you have in your PC?
Please send me the wav file for analyzing.

Stefan
